sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import SocialWidget from '../Widget/SocialWidget'; import Newsletter from '../Widget/Newsletter'; import './header.scss'; import ContactInfoWidget from '../Widget/ContactInfoWidget'; import Div from '../Div'; import DropDown from './DropDown'; import FFHLogo from '../../images/ffh.png' export default function Header({ variant }) { const [isSticky, setIsSticky] = useState(false); const [sideHeaderToggle, setSideHeaderToggle] = useState(false); const [mobileToggle, setMobileToggle] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener('scroll', () => { if (window.scrollY > 0) { setIsSticky(true); } else { setIsSticky(false); } }); }, []); return ( <>
  • setMobileToggle(false)}> Home
  • setMobileToggle(false)} > Watch Films
  • setMobileToggle(false)} > 1st Take
  • setMobileToggle(false)} > Urban Film Festival
  • setMobileToggle(false)}> WWU Distribution
setMobileToggle(!mobileToggle)} >
setSideHeaderToggle(!sideHeaderToggle)} >
